arts.ttl: Portsmouth mourn death after Fratton Park medical emergency against Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Pompey are mourning the death of a supporter in today’s match with Middlesbrough.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Portsmouth announce death of fan after Middlesbrough clash halted by medical emergency
arts.sum: A Portsmouth fan has sadly died after being taken ill during their Championship match against Middlesbrough played on Saturday afternoon at Fratton Park

arts.ttl: 'I've always dreamed of this': Portsmouth's hero's achieves ambition 35 years in the making after destroying Newcastle rivals Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Matt Ritchie finally toasted the achievement of an ambition 35 years in the making and insisted: I always dreamed of this moment.

arts.ttl: ‘One of the best’: Portsmouth boss’ significant statement after downing big-spending Middlesbrough
arts.sum: John Mousinho rated Pompey’s victory over Middlesbrough as one of his side’s most impressive of the season.

arts.ttl: 'Far too much' - Michael Carrick pinpoints what cost Middlesbrough in Portsmouth loss - Teesside Live
arts.sum: Speaking after, Carrick said: “We let the game get away from us again, and it’s something we’ve let happen far too much recently. Boro led at Fratton Park thanks to Emmanuel Latte Lath's goal and looked in a good position at half-time even if their performance hadn't quite been their best.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth forward ruled out for rest of season as Blues' injury woes continue
'Take a bow Matt Ritchie. Turning point in our season' - Portsmouth fans react to victory against Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been sharing their thoughts on the Blues’ superb come-from-behind win against Middlesbrough.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth boy the hero as his side down play-off chasing Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Matt Ritchie’s two-goal heroics saw Pompey come from behind to topple play-off chasing Middlesbrough.

arts.ttl: 'Fairy-tale moments, Going to be huge player, Wonderful pass': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings against Middlesbrough
arts.sum: It was the Matt Ritchie show as the Pompey fought back to claim another Fratton Park win.

arts.ttl: Matt Ritchie double sees Portsmouth come from behind to beat Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Emmanuel Latte Lath had put the visitors in front.
